#summary Getting started with subversion

= Introduction =

How to start using subversion under Windows.

= Details =

Details how to start.

==Links:==

 * Subversion package:
 http://subversion.tigris.org/project_packages.html
 * RapidSVN client:
 http://rapidsvn.tigris.org/

==Checkout==
 * Start RapidSVN, menu "Repository", choose "Checkout"
 * Fill URL with: "https://asmprofiler.googlecode.com/svn/trunk"
 * Fill destination directory and press OK
 * login with username and password


==Create repository?==

Create local repository:

{{{c:\Program Files\Subversion\bin>svnadmin create c:\projects\svn}}}
